title: 820-4924-A no thunderbolt
message:
completaly clean board, no power on the port that is close to the MagSafe and only sometimes I get power from the second port..
Don't have experience with this issue, need a kick start.

title: 820-4924-A no thunderbolt
message: For the love of God just don't even try. Looks like intermittent contact, so bad port is likely. Good luck replacing that, I NEVER fix Thunderbolt, nightmare.

title: 820-4924-A no thunderbolt
